node_types.label: NetworkNode
node_types.description: A node in the 5G network, such as the UE, gNB, AMF, etc.

node_types.label: ProtocolMessage
node_types.description: A message exchanged between network nodes, carrying data or control information.

node_types.label: UserState
node_types.description: The current state of a user, including location, connection status, etc.

node_types.label: Procedure
node_types.description: A sequence of steps that defines a specific network function or operation.

node_types.label: RRCSetupRequest
node_types.description: Request message from UE to establish RRC connection.

node_types.label: RRCSetup
node_types.description: Response message from gNB with connection configuration.

node_types.label: RRCSetupComplete
node_types.description: Message from UE signaling successful connection establishment.

node_types.label: gNB
node_types.description: Gateway Node B, responsible for managing the connection.
